name: War Of The Briefcase
description:
It is a shooting game for a single player, in which you will have to go through the game field in search of a briefcase, which you must find before the enemy and protect it for a certain time, when it passes through the door of your faction. it will open and you will have to go through it to escape and win the game.


Briefcase War features a first-person survival style of gameplay in which the player survives enemies, maintaining the same gameplay model and alternating between completing missions, it is a bold and fast-paced game.

This shooter consists of 6 scenarios, which can be accessed after unlocking them by completing the main mission in each of them, the scenario will be accessible from the level menu located at the beginning of the game.

Within the playable scenarios you will have:

-A main practice map that will serve you to prepare yourself, complete the mission and be ready for the following scenarios.

-A tropical island where a war took place and therefore you have remains of military vehicles scattered around the map as well as a surprise inside.

-A city in the desert where you will have to go through its streets in search of the briefcase and escape from the enemy.

-A castle with several secret spaces where you will be able to cross the interior of this one and to find dungeons secrtas full of treasures.

-A city of terror where you can find a cemetery, destroyed houses, dark and scary roads, as well as witches in the city.

-A forest of big trees, large terrains and enemies ready to fight against you.

In this first version of the game you will have access to the main menu with the first test level unlocked, which you can access from the play button and you will see a short video tutorial that will teach you how to play.

At the moment only the practice level is available, so that you can live the experience the game in new updates will be implemented with new scenarios with different environments for exploration.

Within this first version are the two platforms with which you can play.

The web platform is fully playable from the browser but has some bugs in the display of the video tutorial and in the display of the bullets of the enemies. 

If you want to live the best experience that et offers the game you must download it this disponoble for windows and you will not have problems with any bug or visualization of the game.

You will have two weapons at your disposal to kill your enemies always carry them with you and you can alternate between them a pistol if you are a little more cautious and you like to kill your enemies with more stealth and a machine gun for the most daring who seek the frontal fight, they like strong emotions and want to kill their enemy without thinking twice.

Within the visual section that you will have in the game, this handles a simple 3d modeling style, and stylized 2d textures, which refers to an allegory to the classic shooter games known, but also aims to appeal to viewers of the new generations.

Remember that you can move your character around the field with the keys, W forwards, S backwards, A to the left side and D to the right side.

you can move the game camera with the mouse keyboard up and down to rotate the view to these points and to the right and left to rotate it in these directions.

with the right click you can shoot your weapon to kill your enemies. 

the scroll allows you to change your weapon to the two weapons available at the moment, your pistol or a machine gun, you decide how you want to kill your enemy.

and if after playing for a long time you feel like having something to eat or drink you can pause the game with the escape key, don't worry, this will stop the time completely until you are ready.

We will be updating the game quickly and carefully over the coming weeks and months. Here's a brief list of what's coming: 

Lots of level upgrades and level art.

New enemies.

New weapons.

New maps.
